articles.title: Jenna Coleman admits she ‘really messed up’ after The Serpent finished filming - Express
articles.description: JENNA COLEMAN is currently starring in The Serpent as Marie-Andrée Leclerc, the lover and accomplice of killer Charles Sobhraj. As the series comes to an end, the actress opened up on how she 'messed up' when shooting for the show wrapped.
